CustomField.formula: NOT(ISBLANK(ShippingStreet) && ISBLANK(ShippingCity) && ISBLANK(ShippingState) && ISBLANK(ShippingPostalCode) && ISBLANK(ShippingCountry)) && c2g__CODAValidatedShippingStreet__c == ShippingStreet && c2g__CODAValidatedShippingCity__c == ShippingCity && c2g__CODAValidatedShippingState__c == ShippingState && c2g__CODAValidatedShippingPostCode__c == ShippingPostalCode && c2g__CODAValidatedShippingCountry__c == ShippingCountry
CustomField.label: Shipping Address Validated
